entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature rising to minus 31 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 30.
